DOC.criteria: 18 year male patient ; Absent incomplete puberty development ; Serum testosterone value 3.47 nmol/L low normal serum LH FSH concentration . least two pituitary hormone deficiency Brain MRI show absent thin pituitary stalk , pituitary hypoplasia and/or ectopic posterior pituitary . cryptorchidism history cause hypopituitarism severe systemic disease
